sentences.english: Treatment strategies of IM were antiviral and symptomatically therapy.
sentences.chinese: 本組治療以抗病毒和對症治療爲主。

sentences.english: In the control group, the treatments were given upon the symptoms with calcium and analgesics.

sentences.english: The treatment of vascular dementia include prevention and symptomatic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 血管性癡呆的治療包括預防和對症治療。

sentences.english: In doing ideological work, one must suit one's methods to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 做思想工作必須對症下藥。

sentences.english: His financial white paper gets much right.
sentences.chinese: 他的金融白皮書有很多對症下藥之處。

sentences.english: Another reason to find a long pustules, symptomatic treatment.

sentences.english: Two patients were treated by resection of capitulum radius and plaster fixation after operation.
sentences.chinese: 均行橈骨小頭切除術，術後常規石膏固定對症處理。

sentences.english: If she had swiftly reached trained medical staff with the right drugs, she would not have died.
sentences.chinese: 如果有訓練有素的醫護人員對症下藥，她不會死去。

sentences.english: The accessory navicular bone is one of the most symptomatic bones of the foot.
sentences.chinese: 配件舟骨腳的最對症的骨頭之一。

sentences.english: And it is possible to find the right medicine even from a quack doctor.

sentences.english: Admittedly, the temperature is regarded as the treatment of renal aphrodisiac Yang impotence.
